item.title: Fuseproject's Three-Port Zolt Charger
item.description:
Fuseproject's Three-Port Zolt Charger

Launching today, the Zolt Laptop Charger aims to make powering all your devices faster, easier and much less cumbersome. The charger-designed by fuseproject -is a sleek, lightweight device with three USB ports. This translates to charging three devices (laptop, phone, smartwatch, portable phone-charger, you name it) all at once-while only using one power outlet.

item.title: A Disney space station? It no longer seems like such a goofy idea
item.description:
A Disney space station? It no longer seems like such a goofy idea

Throughout our planet's space-faring history, there have been two major impediments to putting a lot of private citizens into orbit. Only governments have had spacecraft, and there have been only a few, government-controlled, space stations to visit. But now that may finally changing in a big way.
